byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: First Data Corp files for initial public offering, marking planned return to stock market after eight years; Kohlberg Kravis Roberts, which is majority owner, plans to sell off its holdings in what may be one of largest stock sales in 2015.
lead_paragraph: The company, bought by K.K.R. for $29 billion in 2007, did not say in its filing how much money it planned to raise.

headline.main: First Data I.P.O. Is Likely to Be One of Year’s Largest
headline.print_headline: First Data, Payments Processor Owned by K.K.R., Files to Go Public

snippet: The company, bought by K.K.R. for $29 billion in 2007, did not say in its filing how much money it planned to raise.
